q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Cutters' AND type = 'cut';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group named 'Advanced Cutters'

steps.sql:
SELECT ot.order_id, ot.order_name
     FROM order_product ot
     WHERE ot.id NOT IN (
         SELECT ct.order_product_id
         FROM cutting_tasks ct
         WHERE ct.working_group_id = 6 AND ct.status != 2
     );
steps.description: Find the cutting tasks that the 'Advanced Cutters' group has not completed
